mapper.select: SELECT ch.id id, ch.charge_name chargeName, ch.charge_standard chargeStandard, ch.version version, date_format(ch.gmt_create, '%Y-%m-%d %T') gmtCreate, date_format(ch.gmt_modified, '%Y-%m-%d %T') gmtModified FROM tb_charge c WHERE ch.deleted = '0' ORDER BY ch.id ASC LIMIT #{offSet}, #{pageRow}

SELECT ch.id id, ch.charge_name chargeName, ch.charge_standard chargeStandard, ch.version version, date_format(ch.gmt_create, '%Y-%m-%d %T') gmtCreate, date_format(ch.gmt_modified, '%Y-%m-%d %T') gmtModified FROM tb_charge ch
ch.charge_name LIKE concat('%', #{chargeName}, '%')
AND ch.deleted = '0'
ORDER BY ch.id ASC LIMIT #{offSet}, #{pageRow}
